name: Crystal Combine
description: Crystal Combine was created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 in 7 days by 1 person. In this game, you must go up against waves of robots and use your towers to defend yourself from them. Enemies drop bits and crystals, bits are used to build your towers while crystals upgrade them. Different crystals don't combine, while 2 crystals of the same type are stronger together.
